detail_desc: Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Dress in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long dress with a lace bodice and satin skirt. Opening and button at the back of the neck, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.

Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets, and heart-shaped patches on the knees. Soft cotton jersey lining in a contrasting colour.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with decorative gathers at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathers at the back of the neck to create soft draping, and a rounded hem.
Metal chain bracelets. Two plain and two with pendants. Adjustable length.
Leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.

Long, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the knees. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, tie belt at the waist and short, flared sleeves. Lined.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and at the sides and front pockets.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose weave with a drawstring seam below the bust. Unlined.
Chunky-knit sweater vest in soft wool with a V-neck, hole-knit details and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in a patterned organic cotton weave with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke with a motif at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem, and a decorative bow at the front of the hem.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with narrow straps that tie at the back of the neck, a V-neck with decorative ties at the front and a smocked back. Pleats at the front and long, wide legs.
Vest top in cotton jersey doubled with a layer of mesh on the front. Ribbing around the neckline and armholes, a print motif on the front, and an appliqué at the front of the hem.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a faceted plastic bead.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with lacing down the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with raw-edge hems. Slim fit.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a patterned band. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Handkerchief in patterned mulberry silk. Size 33x33 cm.
Calf-length skirt in jersey made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Padded parka with a soft finish, a pile-lined, detachable hood with a faux fur trim, and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener and zip down the front. Fake top pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fastener, and knitted ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Lined.
Chinos in soft, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, and fake front and back pockets.
Jumper in a rib knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with wide, frill-trimmed elasticated shoulder straps and a deep neckline at the back with covered elastication and horizontal ties. Lined.
Top in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a small appliqué at the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and ventilating mesh sections.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved T-shirts in ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs and an overlocked hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Shorter-style top in an airy rib knit. Deep wide neckline with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves and frill-trimmed smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck and wrapover front. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, and a skirt with pleats. Partly lined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders and no buttons.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip with a chin guard at the front and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Suede loafers with a decorative seam at the front and soft heel caps so they can be worn as slip-ons. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Blouse in a viscose weave with one draped shoulder and one with concealed press-studs. Stand-up collar with ties, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fully lined tankini top with a V-neck and ties at the back of the neck. Concealed elastication under the bust for extra support and gathers in the sides for best fit. The top is made partly from recycled polyamide and polyester.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Hat in felted fabric with a band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Imitation leather hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Imitation leather purse with a zip around the top, card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x19.5 cm.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a wrapover and concealed press-stud at one side, a detachable tie belt at the waist and an asymmetric hem at the front. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a twisted detail at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
V-neck jumper in a soft, stocking-stitched knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Narrow, braided belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Mesh Brazilian briefs with a high waist and decorative elastic strap at the top. Lined gusset, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of chinos in a cotton weave. Shirt with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and a detachable bow tie with an elastic strap. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and side pockets. Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with a plumeti texture. Round neckline and a low-cut back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow trims and buttons at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. V-neck inner dress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
